ns24:export-package.application-director-version: vFabric Application Director CLI BETA BUILD [5.0.0-809876]

application-versions.name: Microsoft Sharepoint Server 2010
application-versions.description:
This example contains a single node Sharepoint server with a sample application.
Microsoft SharePoint 2010 makes it easier for people to work together. Using SharePoint 2010, your people can set up Web sites to share information with others, manage documents from start to finish, and publish reports to help everyone make better decisions.

application.name: Microsoft Sharepoint Server 2010
application.description: Microsoft SharePoint 2010 makes it easier for people to work together. Using SharePoint 2010, your people can set up Web sites to share information with others, manage documents from start to finish, and publish reports to help everyone make better decisions.

group.name: Default
group.description: The Default vFabric Application Director group.

vm-template-version.name: W2K8 R2 Enterprise SP1
vm-template-version.description: Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise SP1 VM

meta-tag-type.name: Server Type
meta-tag-type.description: Server type, primarily used for organizing data.

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

meta-tag-type.description: Hardware Architecture, used to describe whether something is or supports 32 bit, 64 bit, etc.

vm-physical-templates.name: w2k8r2sp1_v4
vm-physical-templates.description: Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise, VMTools, VMware JRE installed in c:\opt\vmware\jre-1.6.0_31-win64, AppDAgentBootstrap service running as user "darwin".

vm-physical-templates.name: w2k8r2sp1_v5
vm-physical-templates.description: Same as w2k8r2sp1_v4, but with a new bootstrap agent that supports reboots.

vm-template.name: W2K8 R2 Enterprise SP1

application-version.name: Microsoft Sharepoint Server 2010
application-version.description:
This example contains a single node Sharepoint server with a sample application.
Microsoft SharePoint 2010 makes it easier for people to work together. Using SharePoint 2010, your people can set up Web sites to share information with others, manage documents from start to finish, and publish reports to help everyone make better decisions.
